Player History
Drafted in 4th round, 94th overall pick, by Gashouse in 1981...
Injured on 5/30/1982 with a Hyper Extended Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had first career hit on 4/27/1985, off Franky Mosqueda (Ash)...
Hit first career homerun on 8/21/1985, off Thomas North (LYN)...
Injured on 4/15/1986 with a Bruised Heel, out for one week...
Traded from Gashouse to Halifax on 2/2/1987 (Going to GHG: 3B A. Palacios, P S. Olmos. Going to HAL: SS J. Cadena)...
Traded from Halifax to Bay City on 7/30/1988 (Going to BC: SS J. Cadena. Going to HAL: P M. Sanders)...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Shortstop in 1990...
Signed as a free agent by Gashouse on 2/26/1991 to a 3-year deal worth $2,336,800 per year...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Shortstop in 1991...
